column4: evening all, do i need to uninstall google earth before updating it or is there a "sudo update google earth linux cool" type string that is the universal fixall for well, google earth?
i haven't seen google earth in the ubuntu repos, but from my experience you can just download the updated foofle earth and just install over the top of the old one
I only ask because the last time i did that it didnt install over, i just had 2 installs
you just need to make sure it installs into the same directory. I use the default directories so I haven't had a problem yet
